name: 愛依
text: あ……プロデューサー……おはよ～

name: 愛依
text:
あ～、別にだいじょーぶだいじょーぶ
昨日ちょっと、弟と妹の相手してただけだから
trans:
Ah, I'm fine, I'm fine, just yesterday, 
I was helping out with my little brother and sister.

name: プロデューサー
trans: (So she is a little tired then...?)

text:
面倒見が
いいんだな
trans:
It's great that
you're taking
care of them.

You should take
a short break.

name: 愛依
text:
うちもお姉ちゃんだしね～
ふたりの世話すんの多い的な？
trans:
I'm also an older sister after all~ 
The two of them need a lot of help.

name: 愛依
text: ま、相手すんの楽しいんだけどね♪
trans: Well, it's fun to help out with them♪

name: 愛依
text: へーきへーき、次のレッスンまであんま時間ないっしょ？
trans: Alright alright, not until after my next lesson though okay?

name: 愛依
text: 確認とかしとかないとじゃん？
trans: I have a couple things I need to check on yeah?

name: 愛依
text:
確かにちょっと疲れっけどね～
ま、うちの仕事だから
trans:
I'm definitely a little tired~
But, that's my job.

name: 愛依
text: んでも昨日はさすがに大変だったわ～……

name: プロデューサー
text: （うっ……しまった。別のことを言えば良かったな……）
trans: (Ah… I should've said something else instead…)
